pages.text: In the following pages you will find a compendium of various multiblock structures that are needed to craft many things. These pages include a list of all the required materials, a visualizable render of the structure, and a pastebin link for a $(l:useful_things/building_tools/templates)Template$() to be used with the $(l:useful_things/building_tools/transferrence_tome)Tome of Transferrence$().
